## Source: ossf-package-analysis (17c1e0da97c7ad75962a2d0ba61d3bc72260f5b1f75cf3fe405ce26ea9d8eb4e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vesper-synth-user-lib' @ 20.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
